attributes.richTextValue:
Unlock the Potential of
Cell Therapies

We offer scalable single-use bioreactors and process
development services to solve your cell product
manufacturing challenges.

An Experienced Partner For Your
Cell Therapy Journey

Our products and services enable the scalable
manufacturing of allogeneic therapies derived from cells
such as induced pluripotent stem cells, mesenchymal stem
cells, and CAR-T or NK cells.

Whether you are just getting started or are ready to move
into clinical trials and beyond, we can accelerate the
commercialization of your therapeutic product.

Products

View our full line of Vertical-Wheel ® bioreactors and contact
our Sales team for product inquiries and orders.

Services

See if our industry-leading BioLab team can help you solve
your process development and scale-up challenges. .

leadership team, and career opportunities.
